catalog_info.title: Advanced Russian II: Reading, Composition, and Conversation
catalog_info.notes: Strongly recommended for students who plan to continue in Russian.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Russian 101 or placement at the 103 level.
catalog_info.description: Continuing work on vocabulary and grammar centering on verbs and verb government. Readings include works by Chekhov and Dostoevsky, poetry, and film.Please note that this course will also meet for two additional hours of speaking practice to be arranged the first week of classes. See language course notes on our website for information about sectioning, pass/fail, satisfactory/unsatisfactory, auditing, and language track information.
